episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_0100:
Hmm... The sync pairs seem to be less motivated
lately. Maybe the heat is getting to them...
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_0200:
Pathetic fools! What’s the point of me rising to the
top if all the sync pairs are weaklings?!
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_0300:
Hmph. So be it. I’ll just have to come up with
something else to make Pasio famous that isn’t
Pokémon battles.
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_0400:
Some new attractions ought to bring in strong
sync pairs!
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_0500:
I’ve got to come up with something special that’ll
breathe new life into Pasio and generate a bunch
of publicity!
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_0600:
Rachel! Can’t you see I’m trying to think?
Knock off that humming already!
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_0800:
But it’s, like, summer, y’know? The time for playing
in the water and going to festivals and all that
fun stuff.
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_0900:
It’s enough to make me wanna sing a little
song, y’knooow?
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_1000:
We’re surrounded by water! You can play in it
whenever you want! And festivals? Singing?
Utter nonsense!
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_1100:
It’s that kind of ridiculous carefree attitude that’s
making all the sync pairs—
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_1200:
Wait a minute... Maybe it’s not so ridiculous
after all!
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_1300: Excellent work, Rachel! Ha ha ha ha!
episode_event_summer_2020/4001_1001_1400: Huuuh? Did I just do something right?
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1101_0100:
Having been invited by Steven and Lyra,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] arrives at the festival.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1101_0200:
The sounds of lively music and singing can be
heard in all directions.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_0300: Wow. It looks like everyone’s having a good time.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_0400:
This is the Sync Pair Music Festival, a celebration
of summer here on Pasio...
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_0500:
This place is popping! It’s everything I could ever
want in a music festival! Jigglypuff seems to be
enjoying it, too!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_0600:
And whatever that is wafting over from the food
booths smells delicious...
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_0700:
The food booths do look good, not to mention
the other booths that have shooting games and
prize raffles.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_0800:
Is that a Hoenn Rangers action figure? It’s not
every day you come across one of those. Do you
know about the Hoenn Rangers?
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_0401_1000:
I’m impressed. Even in Hoenn, there aren’t many
people who know about them.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_0302_1100: Are they some kind of heroes?
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_0402_1200:
Yes. They’re a team of local heroes who operated
in Hoenn back in the day.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_1300:
I hear their popularity was short-lived due to the
Pokémon Contest Spectaculars starting up around
the same time.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_1400:
Come to think of it, the excitement of this festival
reminds me of the Pokémon Contest Spectaculars.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_1500:
I’d love a chance to take the stage at a Pokémon
Contest Spectacular someday!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_1600:
Huh? Is that Lear? It doesn’t look like he’s about
to start singing, though...
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_1700:
Ladies and gentlemen! I’m glad to see you all
enjoying yourselves at the Sync Pair Music Festival!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_1900:
Pasio was created to determine which sync pair
is the strongest of all!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_2000:
With that in mind, I hereby declare that a contest
will be held...
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_2100:
A contest to decide which sync pairs reign
supreme as a musical act! I present...the Pasio
Superstar Competition!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_2300:
You’ll all form teams and compete for first place
by playing music with your partner Pokémon!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_2400:
Those who rise above the rest in the categories
of musical sense and group composition will be
crowned Pasio’s Superstars!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_2500: Awww yeah! I’m all fired up!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_2600:
Wow! This sounds kinda like a Pokémon Contest
Spectacular! Let’s show them what we’ve got, Ali!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_2700:
And since I’m such a nice guy, I’ve prepared
a prize to make things more exciting!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_2800:
In addition to prize money, I will graciously
appoint the winning team to act as my official
Pasio promo reps!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_2900:
Official Pasio promo reps?! So we’d sorta be like
celebrities! That sounds like fun!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_3000:
This is your chance to be the face of Pasio! You
better show some gratitude!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_3100:
In fact, since I’m such a nice guy, I’ve even
prepared a prize for the second-place team!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_3200:
Well done as always, young master! How
generous of you!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_3300:
I’m sooooo jealous. You guys better show some
gratitude to Master Lear, ’kay?
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_3400:
That takes care of that! Now, let’s start things
off by separating the wheat from the chaff in
the preliminaries!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_3500:
If you want to make it to the finals, beat out the
competition and prove you’ve got what it takes!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_3700:
The Pasio Superstar Competition, huh? Prizes aside,
this seems like a good chance to test my skills.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_3800:
I can sense from my sync stone that Sandslash has
gotten stronger. Now I’d like to see it for myself.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_3900:
And I’d also like my Metagross to see me in my
moment of triumph since we’ve trained so
much together.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_4000:
Jigglypuff and I are actually really into the idea
of being celebrities...
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_4100:
Plus, we practice songs together all the time.
We’ve been looking for a chance to show
them off!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_4200: Why don’t the three of us make a team, then?
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_0401_4400:
Yeah! Since we’re already here at the festival, we
might as well try our best to win!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_0401_4500:
I’m glad to be a part of the team! I have no
intention of losing in either musical sense or
group composition!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_0402_4700:
Of course! If we’re going to do it, we’ve got
to win!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_0402_4800:
That’s the spirit! I mean, I intended to win this
from the start.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_4900:
All right. First, we have to make it through
the preliminaries.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_5000: It looks like we’re up against them first.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_5100: We’re bona fide festival fans ourselves, you know!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_5200:
Our Alolan spirit is burning bright like
Flame Wheel!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_5300:
Mm-hmm! I’ll show off an Alolan song I’ve been
practicing, too!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_5400:
The team from Alola, where summer never ends...
Looks like we’ve already got our work cut out
for us.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_5500: Yeah. They’re burning bright as the sun itself!
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_5600:
In that case, let’s cool them off with our
own music.
episode_event_summer_2020/4002_1001_5800:
Let’s get focused and ready for our first
team competition!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_0100:
Wow! That was impressive! I guess we lost
this time.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_0200:
You beat our burning Alolan spirit? You’re really
something, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_0300:
Yes. It’s unfortunate that we lost, but I guess we’ll
just have to cheer for you now.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_0400:
All right! Let’s Accelerock our way back to the
spectator area, yeah!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_0500:
I’m going to get something to eat at one of the
food booths!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_0600: My goodness. What a restless bunch.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_0700:
I’ll be going now. I’ve got my fingers crossed for
your victory.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1101_0800:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team continued
their winning streak, making it all the way to
the finals!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_0900:
It looks like we made to the finals. Well done,
everyone, for making it this far.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_1000:
Singing and dancing out in the sun is more tiring
than I expected, but it sure is a lot of fun!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_1100:
You two seem to be enjoying this almost too much.
Are you feeling OK?
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_1200:
We’re fine! Knowing the finals are right around
the corner has me really fired up.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_1300:
Wow! That feels so cold and refreshing! Thank
you, Sandslash!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_1400:
It looks like Sandslash is worried about you, too.
Be careful not to get so fired up that you burn out.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1101_1500:
The final showdown of the Pasio Superstar
Competition is about to begin!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1101_1600:
Participating teams, please assemble onto the
stage as you are called.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_1800:
I’m certainly not surprised we’re competing
against them for first place.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_2000: Hoenn’s own contest idol! The Miraculous Lisia!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_2100: The name’s Ryuki. I’m what you might call a star.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_2200:
I’ve made it this far so I can play a gig in
the finals!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_2400:
As if we’d lose a music competition! First place is
as good as ours!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_2500: Lissi! Scout me as your next boyfriend!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_2600: Ryuki! Let ’em hear the world’s best scream!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_2800: Wow... The crowd’s really going wild!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_2900:
Two musicians and a contest idol. It looks like a lot
of their fans have come to cheer them on, too.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_3000: You’ll go easy on us today, won’t you, Steven?
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_3100:
Hey, you may be Wallace’s niece, but that doesn’t
mean I’m going to hold back!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_3200: Hehehe. I’m so excited to battle the Champion!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_3300:
Oh my! What a cute outfit! Would you mind telling
me your name?
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_3400:
What?! Oh, uh, I’m Lyra! I guess I’m a little
interested in contests...
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_3500:
Oh, really?! I guess I better scout you for a
contest right away!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_3600:
On second thought, maybe after we’re done
competing, huh?
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_3700: Ryuki, was it? I’ve heard stories about your skill.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_3800:
I’m honored, Champion! I can’t believe a star from
Hoenn knows who I am!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_3900:
And that cool new face there must be an Alolan
Sandslash! I bet he’d be great for a jam session!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_4000:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Even if we’re up
against you and a Champion, we won’t lose!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_0401_4200:
I guess you could say that. I figure making a name
for myself here might encourage my old man while
he’s chasing his dream back in Unova.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_0402_4400:
I guess you could say that. I figure making a name
for myself here might encourage my old man while
he’s chasing his dream back in Unova.
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_4500:
Uh, I mean, not that I care about him that much
or anything! Let’s get this party started already!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_4600:
Looks like you’re all done with your little chat.
All right, then. Let the final competition begin!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_4700: The audience will decide which team wins!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_4800:
I expect you all to deliver performances worthy of
the Pasio Superstar Competition!
episode_event_summer_2020/4003_1001_4900:
This is my chance to be a star. I’ve got to give it
my all!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_0100: Wow! They both did a great job!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_0200:
We’ve got to put it all on the line, too, Jigglypuff!
C’mon, let’s go!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_0400:
I’m Lyra and this is Jigglypuff! Hope you enjoy
our song!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_0600: Uh-oh... It looks like their enthusiasm backfired.
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_0800:
Jigglypuff’s voice is pretty potent... At this rate,
we’re all...gonna fall...asleep...
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_0900:
Hey! Wake up! You can’t go beddy-bye in the
middle of a live show!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_1000: Well done, Ryuki! I’m wide awake now!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_1200: Now’s not the time for you to be thankin’ me!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_1300:
We’re gonna take the stage if you
keep dillydallyin’!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_1400: Oh, right! Jigglypuff! Once more from the top!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_1500: Use your gentle voice just like you always do.
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_1600: Whoa! Wh-what’s gotten into you, Jigglypuff?!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_1700: I think she digs our loud music!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_1800:
Jigglypuff sing differently depending on the
region they’re from, you know!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_1900:
I bet she heard us screaming and dug it so much,
she wanted to try it out herself!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_2100:
I’m sorry, Jigglypuff. I never realized you could
sing like that.
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_2200:
All right! In that case, I’ll just keep up with
Jigglypuff’s new style!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_2300: Now, let our Johto spirit ring out loud!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_2400:
Nice! I like that intensity! Everyone needs some
intensity now and then to shake things up!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_2500:
I think I’m falling in love! How could such a cute
face make such loud, heavy music?!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_2600:
Rock on, little lady! Don’t let her show you
up, Ryuki!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_2700: Oooh! This is blowing my mind!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_2800:
Wow. Never in a million years did I think she
could sing like that.
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_0301_2900: She’s even a match for Ryuki!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_0401_3000: She sure is. And Ryuki seems happy about it, too.
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_0402_3200: Yes! I think it’s cool, too.
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_3300:
Come on, we still have time to show them what
we’ve got.
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_3400:
Let’s win over the audience and secure our
first-place spot!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_3500:
Hehe. Looks like we’ve reached the next chapter
in your story, Lyra!
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_3600:
This is a little different from the Pokémon Contest
Spectacular, so it won’t be as easy...
episode_event_summer_2020/4004_1001_3700: but we’ve got to give it our all! Right, Ali?
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_0100:
Our fans are cheering us on, after all! You and I
are definitely going to win this, Ali!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_0200:
This is our chance to stand on the same stage as a
contest idol! Losing is not an option!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_0300:
Yo, Hoenn superstar! I’m gonna surpass you
and get one step closer to making my mark on
the world!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_0400:
And I’m going to prove my bond with Sandslash
by winning against you!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_0500:
This is the homestretch! We’ll take on your
determination with our poisonous performance!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_0700:
Both teams were equal in terms of skill, but the
winner by a slim margin is...
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_0900: Now then, let’s start the awards ceremony!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_1000:
We’ll start by handing out the prizes for the team
that took first place. Try to show some gratitude,
will you?!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_1100:
To think that the Champion of Hoenn has become
the poster boy for Pasio...
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_1200: I guess this competition was a good idea after all!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_1400:
Steven has a lot of fans, after all. We’ll probably
get a lot of business after this.
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_1500:
So we’re the official promo reps of Pasio now?
I wonder how we’re supposed to act.
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_1600: Congratulations, Lyra. Keep up the good work!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_1800: We’ll always be cheering for you and Ali, Lisia!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_1900: Huh? You don’t look very happy, Steven.
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_2000:
Oh, that’s not it. I’m happy I was able to win first
place with Sandslash at my side.
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_2100:
It’s just that I’m not very interested in prize money
or becoming an official promo rep or anything
like that.
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_2200: Speaking of prizes, we get one, too, don’t we?
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_2300: I’m excited to see what it is!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_2400: Next is the second place team! Your prize is...
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_2500: a statue of yours truly sculpted from a rare ore!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_2800:
Put this symbol of your team someplace where
everyone can get a good look at it!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_2900:
That’s totally craaazy, Master Lear.
I’m sooo jealous.
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_3000:
What wonderful thoughtfulness! Well done as
always, young master!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_3100: Wow... That sure is a surprising prize!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_3200:
But where on earth are we going to put such a
big statue?
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_3400: Incredible! This ore... Is this what I think it is?
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_3500:
Ah-ha! I knew it! It’s so hard to get these days,
what with the increase in industrial demand!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_3600:
Gosh! I’m so jealous of you all! You get to look at
this ore every day!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_3700:
Hehe. What a great smile. You sure do live up to
your name, Steven Stone!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_3800:
If it’s all right with you two, I think it might be a
good idea to give this statue to Steven. What do
you think?
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_3900:
Fine by me! It’s too heavy to fit in my
luggage anyway.
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_4000:
Yeah, I don’t mind. He’d be taking a load off our
hands. Literally...
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_4200:
Well, you heard them. This statue is our gift to
you, Steven!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_4300: Really?! Thank you! I’ll take good care of it!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_4400:
Hmph. They don’t know what they’re giving up!
But no matter...
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_4500: The Sync Pair Music Festival isn’t over yet!
episode_event_summer_2020/4005_1001_4600:
Get out there and enjoy summertime on Pasio to
the fullest!
